column1: Smoque BBQ////Pretty damn good brisket sandwich and St. Louis ribs. Brisket was plentiful and was super tender and embraced by a square
column2: soft and sweet dinner roll. Â The ribs was like "Wow...that's pretty smokey!" It was fall off the bone perfect. Also
column3: I like that you get two kinds of sauces...I both liked them so I slathered my brisket with both sauces. Also
column4: they have good customer service as they help to bring your tray
column5: gather your utensils and offer to collect your trays after you finished my food.
